content: Condominium Property HDB BTO Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 Jul 2019Can a couple buy a private property Condominium after they've secured their HDB BTO but not moved in yet?Hi. My partner and I have secured our BTO already but are curious whether we can buy a private condo on top of the HDB because we've yet to move in. Is it possible?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leo KwekLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 31 Jul 2019Hi it is not possible. You'll have to complete the 5 years MOP(Minimum Occupation Period) of your BTO first before you can purchase a private condo.0 comments2
